metadata.name: Struggling to Exist
metadata.description:
Digital Multi-Ai Art

When reading about the earliest surviving Human literature; the Epic of Gilgamesh 
I was struck by how similar us Humans react emotionally to tragic heroic and dramatic events - 

We have not changed
Us humans will always have the same set of emotions. 

But rather than looking at the past for answers I project my angst on technology & accelerationism into the future,
I find it reassuring to face my worst nightmares, maybe that way I'll get used to them (before they happen)

With my work i try to depict the very dark advent of an AI super-intelligence & machine supremacy.

Image Description
>Organic Matter Creation by Machine

The essence of this series isn’t about technology, it is about what you feel when facing abstract sights of the future. 
At the core, it’s about Humans, their Experience and their Instincts.
